name: Yashraj Bhatti
position: Director of Web and Mobile Development
bio: Yashraj, a highly experienced member of the E Corp. team, brings more than 15 years of programming and business advisory expertise, with a rich background in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

name: Phil Aylesworth
bio: With over 15 years of public accounting and business advisory service experience in the Tongas, Ecuador, Canada, Botswana and the US, Phil is the most seasoned and diversed member of the E Corp. team.

name: Darren Takaki
bio: Darren is the Director of Development for E Corp. Darren creates learning materials for E Corp. as well as consulting for customers to integrate Solutions into their production pipeline and business processes.

name: Andrew Steele
bio: Andrew joined E corp. in October 1999 as E Corp's first Human Resources Director. As such, he has overall human resources responsibility for E Corp's operations worldwide.

name: Mike Girimonte
position: Vice President of Sales and Marketing
bio: Mike serves as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for E Corp. In this role Mike oversees E Corp's marketing and corporate communications efforts worldwide.
